name: message
doc: Kafka JS schema for cosmos api container 'messages'

fields.name: schema_version
fields.doc: An integer that indicates the version of the schema.

type.doc: List of operations that can be done to a message. Messages are immutable so we can only perform create operations.
type.name: MessageCrudOperation

fields.name: id
fields.doc: An ULID that identifies the message inside the message collection.

fields.name: sender_service_id
fields.doc: The id of the service that sent the message.

fields.name: sender_user_id
fields.doc: The id of the user that sent the message.

fields.name: is_pending
fields.doc: A boolean that indicates if the message has been processed, is_pending equals false indicates that the message has not been processed yet.

fields.name: content_type
fields.doc: Indicates the type of the message.

fields.name: content_payment_data_amount
fields.doc: An integer that indicates the amount of the payment.

fields.name: content_payment_data_notice_number
fields.doc: An id that identifies the the payment.

fields.name: content_payment_data_invalid_after_due_date
fields.doc: A boolean that indicates if the payment is considered invalid after the due date.

fields.name: content_payment_data_payee_fiscal_code
fields.doc: The fiscal code of the payee.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.doc: A timestamp that indicates when the message was created.

fields.name: feature_level_type
fields.doc: A field that indicates whether the message is PREMIUM or not.
